articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Monday Blues! Sensex drops nearly 200 points; Nifty below 22,250 - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, Asian Paints, Titan, Tech Mahindra, Axis Bank, and Wipro opened with cuts, while L&T, Power Grid, UltraTech Cement, M&M, and Tata Steel opened with gains. Mahindra Holidays & Resorts advanced over 5% in morning trade as the firm planned …
articles.content: Amid mixed Asian cues, Indian benchmark equity indices opened in the red on Monday, dragged down by banking, financial, and IT stocks.The BSE Sensex was trading 196 points or 0.27% lower at 72,946. N… [+3257 chars]
